Class HostConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.service.impl.HostConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHostConfigurationService

    public class HostConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHostConfigurationService
    Provides access to the configuration of the Host application.

    sven
